      IUMPResponse submitRequest(IUMPRequest umpRequest, java.lang.String function)
      Invokes a service in a process agent identified by a function name.

    • Method Detail

      • submitRequest

        IUMPResponse submitRequest(IUMPRequest umpRequest,
                           java.lang.String function)
        Invokes a service in a process agent identified by a function name.
        Parameters:
        umpRequest - - Encapsulates the request to the process agent function in a IUMPRequest object
        function - - Function Name identifying the requested service
        Returns:
        An IUMPResponse object containing the result from the process agent

      • pushNotification

        @Deprecated
void pushNotification(IUMPService.UserType userType,
                                   java.lang.String[] users,
                                   java.lang.String portName,
                                   java.lang.String message,
                                   java.lang.String notificationContext)
        Deprecated. 
        Process agents use this method to post a notification message to the client. A notification message is different from a response message and is used as an alerting mechanism.
        Parameters:
        message - - Device notification message

      • pushNotification

        void pushNotification(IUMPService.UserType userType,
                      java.lang.String[] users,
                      java.lang.String portName,
                      PushNotification pushNotification)
        Process agents use this method to post a notification message to the client. A notification message is different from a response message and is used as an alerting mechanism.
        Parameters:
        message - - Device notification message

      • broadcast

        void broadcast(IUMPService.UserType userType,
               java.lang.String[] users,
               java.lang.String portName,
               java.lang.String message,
               java.lang.String alert)
        Broadcasts a message to a list of users identified by one the following Unvired ID, Frontend User ID, Backend User ID, Federation ID.
        Parameters:
        userType - - An enumeration describing the identification type in the users list
        users - - A list of users to whom the message is to be pushed
        message - - The actual message
        alert - - Customized device notification

      • broadcast

        userType - - An enumeration describing the identification type in the users list
        users - - A list of users to whom the message is to be pushed
        message - - The actual message
        alert - - Customized device notification
        notificationType - - Choose from default, silent or no notification

      • sendMail

        void sendMail(java.lang.String[] to,
              java.lang.String subject,
              java.lang.String message,
              java.io.File[] attachments)
        Process agents use this method to send an email to a list of recipients.
        Parameters:
        to - - List of email recipients
        subject - - Subject line of the email
        message - - Body of the email
